text: Do any of these products catch your interest, or are you after different options?

text.text: what products do I get in the set?

text: The Ambika Lahenga Embroidered Lehenga, Choli, and Dupatta Set includes a lehenga, choli, and dupatta set. Would you like to know more about this product?
Absolutely! We have the Ambika Lahenga Embroidered Lehenga, Choli and Dupatta Set in stock. What size would you like?
The Ambika Lahenga Embroidered Lehenga, Choli and Dupatta Set comes in sizes small, medium, large, and extra-large.

text.text: Normally medium t-shirt fits me. what do you think which size would fit to me for the lehenga?

text: Since the Ambika Lahenga Embroidered Lehenga, Choli and Dupatta Set is a traditional Indian garment, its sizing may differ from regular t-shirts. To ensure the best fit, I recommend choosing a size larger than your usual t-shirt size. In this case, I suggest selecting the large size.
